page.title: 10Children's Interests
page.content: Some groups of girls from our school, Northfleet School for Girls, visited Painter's Ash and Shears Green Primary Schools. We wanted to find out what things children aged between 9 and 11 were interested in. We found out that their favourite hobby is football. When they go out with their friends they choose to go to the cinema. They like casual clothes. If they could spend a day with a famous person, they would choose the singer Madonna. Their favourite foods are MacDonald's hamburgers, kebabs and sausages, all of which are junk food. 99% of the children we interviewed have potato crisps at breaktime. They all like chocolate and sweets, though many of them are worried about getting fat. The majority of the children, given the choice between being boys and girls, would choose to be boys!
